user.title: Connect to Dominion Energy

init.title: Cost Calculation Settings
init.description: Configure how energy costs are calculated.

data_description.fixed_rate: Single rate for all usage (used with Fixed Rate mode)
data_description.peak_rate: Rate during peak hours (used with Time-of-Use mode)
data_description.off_peak_rate: Rate during off-peak hours (used with Time-of-Use mode)
